text: we already have a giant, free fusion reactor in the sky called the sun. just catch it’s energy with pv, store in battery & you’re pretty much done.
author: elonmusk

text: fsd beta 10.2 rolls out friday midnight to ~1000 owners with perfect 100/100 safety scores. rollouts will hold for several days after that to see how it goes. if that looks good, beta will gradually begin rolling out to 99 scores & below.
author: elonmusk

text: a few last minute concerns about this build. release likely on sunday or monday. sorry for the delay.
author: elonmusk

text: beta 10.2 now rolling out to cars with 100/100 safety score over 100 miles
author: elonmusk

text: beta 10.3 releasing friday next week to all cars with 99/100 safety score
author: elonmusk

text: low occlusion gates are challenging, but should be fixed soon
author: elonmusk

text: should be nationwide rollout by end of month. note, still limited by peak number of users in same area. this will improve as more satellites are launched.
author: elonmusk

text: definitely further refinements coming to (early beta) safety test score. it will be refined continuously until it is an extremely good predictor of crash probability. exciting actuarial problem!
author: elonmusk

text: long list of mostly little items, but driving experience is significantly better. we will put notable changes in the release notes.
author: elonmusk

text: everyone with a perfect score with get it. there are ~1000 owners with perfect scores. maybe 1100 to 1200 by friday night.
author: elonmusk

text: note, quality of experience can vary dramatically, as our neural nets have far more training data in some parts of the country than others, but this should improve rapidly with more driving in those regions.
author: elonmusk

text: if it possible to start an ev company without shipping any cars & get a valuation less than a billion dollars!?
author: elonmusk

text: i hope they have a high pain tolerance. scaling production, supply chain, logistics & service is a world of hurt.
author: elonmusk

text: yes, we are talking to airlines about installing starlink. please let them know if you want it on your airliner. low latency ~half gigabit connectivity in the air!
author: elonmusk

text: death note, evangelion, ghost in the shell, spirited away, princess mononoke, full metal alchemist, your name
author: elonmusk

text: maybe next week. we’d like to get to 10.3 before expanding the beta.
author: elonmusk

text: agreed. trying to get all the approvals needed to offer insurance is extremely difficult, but it’s coming.
author: elonmusk

text: but they should go electric now. less range, but so easy, quiet & clean.
author: elonmusk

text: beenz, beenz the musical fruit the more you eat the more you toot
author: elonmusk

text: all the stairwells currently shown as wood-clad will actually have graffiti
author: elonmusk
